name: RandomEpisode
0:
”Alexa open random episode”
”Alexa ask random episode for an episode of King of the HIll”
”Alexa ask random episode for random episode of Modern Family”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random episode
des: Have you watched all of your favorite series and just want to watch a random episode? Simply ask Alexa to open "Random Episode" and no more endless browsing. Series information provided by https://www.tvmaze.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
